data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pellinen, Markku J., Wahlberg, Niklas (2015): A new species of Niganda Moore, 1879 from Thailand, with descriptions of variation in male genitalia and female facies of N. radialis Moore (Lepidoptera: Notodontidae, Ceirinae). Zootaxa 4033 (1): 94-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4033.1.4
